title: Cart Viewed Event Data
description: Data payload for the ecommerce.cart_viewed event. Fired when a user views their shopping cart.

cartId.description: The unique identifier of the shopping cart.

products.description: The list of products currently in the cart.

total.description: The total monetary value of all products in the cart.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the cart total (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).
